text:
Hello,

I think I found a spelling mistake in the error log message that occures when
running a perl cgi script with a wrong path to perl in the header.

The error says "script not found or unable to stat:"
I think "stat" should be "start" here.

SH
creator: 20004632@student.hhs.nl

text: No, it's correct (from stat(2) system call). Thanks for your care anyway :)
creator: nd@perlig.de
